text: Naval personnel attached to SLNS Buwaneka at Nachchikuda in the North Central Naval Command, arrested 14 persons while harvesting sea cucumbers, in the sea area off Keeramunal (20).The suspects were apprehended along with 302 Nos of Sea Cucumbers, a dinghy, diving apparatus and subsequently handed over to the fisheries inspector at Kilinochchi for further investigations.
title: Navy arrests 14 fishermen for harvesting sea cucumbers illegally
